data.title: Disney Animated Classics List
data.meta_description: Guide to release status of Walt Disney Animated Classics on DVD and Blu-ray, from Snow White to Big Hero 6. Reviews, info, news, discussion board, contests, countdowns, links.
data.text:
# Title Year Available on DVD? Notes 1 Snow White and

the Seven Dwarfs 1937 2009 2-Disc DVD:

Diamond Edition Blu-ray:

Platinum Edition DVD:

2-Disc DVD (2009): 1.33:1, DD 5.1 DEHT, 1.0; Tiffany Thornton music video,

updated "Disney Through the Decades" documentary, Dopey's Wild Mine Ride

game, "Heigh-Ho" sing-along, "Snow White Returns" featurette, "The One

That Started It All", Princess and the Frog sneak peek; $29.99 SRP

Diamond Edition (2 Blu-ray discs, 1 DVD): 1.33:1, DTS 7.1, DD 1.0

2009 DVD extras plus exclusive interactive Hyperion Studios tour with

featurettes and classic cartoons; galleries; $39.99 SRP; Review

Also available in Collector's Book Set, 7 Dwarf Plush Gift Set, Limited

Edition Collector's Set, and Deceptive DVD Packaging

Original 2-disc Platinum Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1 & 1.0, THX, Out of Print,

commentary, making-of documentary, Dopey's Wild Mine Ride game, art

galleries, Barbra Streisand music video, sing-along, "The Goddess of

Spring" short, History, storyboard-to-film comparisons, more featurettes,

abandoned concepts, deleted scenes, "The Restoration", Publicity material,

"Disney Through the Decades", trailers, radio broadcasts & more; Review 2 Pinocchio 1940 Platinum Edition DVD:

Blu-ray:

Gold Collection DVD:

2-Disc Platinum Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1 & 1.0, audio commentary, fact

track, music video, song selection, deleted scenes, making-of documentary,

art galleries, "The Sweatbox" featurette, trailers, live-action reference

footage, deleted song, Pinocchio's Puzzles; Review

Also on Blu-ray with BD-Live, Cine-Explore, Disc 1 of DVD

Gold Collection: 1.33:1, DD 4.0, THX, trailer; Out of Print; Review 3 Fantasia 1940 2-Movie DVD:

2-Movie BD + DVD:

60th Anniversary SE

3-Disc Collector's Ed.

2 Movie Collection with Fantasia 2000; $39.99 SRP; 1.33:1, DD 5.1 DEHT,

"The Disney Family Museum", "Musicana", new audio commentary by

historian Brian Sibley; Also in 4-Disc Blu-ray + DVD Combo ($45.99 SRP)

with DisneyView, 4 additional audio commentaries, "Dali & Disney: A Date with

Destino", Destino, "The Schulthesis Notebook: A Disney Treasure",

interactive art gallery, and Virtual Vault BD-Live features; Review

60th Anniversary SE: 1.33:1, DD/DTS 5.0, THX, 2 commentaries, documentary

Fantasia Anthology: making-of segments, "The Fantasia That Never Was"

abandoned sequences, trailers, TV spots & posters, Fantasia 2000; OOP; Review 4 Dumbo 1941 70th Anniversary BD + DVD:

DVD Edition:

Big Top Edition DVD:

60th Anniversary DVD:

DVD Edition: 1.33:1 OAR, DD 5.1 DEHT; $29.99 SRP; deleted scene,

deleted song, "Taking Flight: The Making of Dumbo", "The Magic of Dumbo: A

Ride of Passage"; Also in 70th Anniversary Blu-ray + DVD Combo ($39.99 SRP)

with Cine-Explore, DisneyView, and Family Play Games; Review

Big Top Edition - 1.33:1, DD 5.1, audio commentary, "Celebrating Dumbo",

art gallery, Walt Disney television introductions, "DisneyPedia: My First Circus",

DVD storybook "Dumbo's Big Discovery", music video: "Baby Mine" by Jim Brickman

& Kassie DePaiva, 2 sing-alongs, bonus Silly Symphony shorts Elmer Elephant and

The Flying Mouse, matching cards game, slipcover; Out of Print; Review

60th Anniversary Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, most Big Top Edition extras plus

2 original trailers, "Sound Design" (The Reluctant Dragon excerpt), read-along,

Michael Crawford "Baby Mine" music video, Dumbo II sneak peek; OOP; Review 5 Bambi 1942 Diamond Edition BD + DVD:

New 2-Disc DVD

Platinum Edition

Diamond Edition Blu-ray + DVD Combo; 1.33:1, 7.1 DTS-HD HR $39.99 SRP;

DisneyView, Disney Second Screen, "Inside Walt's Story Meetings: Enhanced

Edition", deleted scenes, Mickey Mouse shorts, interactive galleries, Family Play

games, classic DVD bonus features, Diane Miller introduction; Review

2011 Interview with Bambi's voice Donnie Dunagan; Also in DVD packaging

New 2-Disc DVD; 1.33:1, DD 5.1; $29.99 SRP; introduction, "Inside Walt's

Story Meetings: Enhanced Edition", classic DVD bonus features

2-Disc Platinum Edition - 1.33:1, DD mono, 5.1 EHT, "The Making of Bambi"

documentary, "Inside Walt's Story Meetings" commentary, art galleries,

Disney Time Capsule: 1942, original theatrical trailer, 2 deleted sequences,

"Restoring Bambi", Excerpt from "Tricks of the Trade", "The Old Mill" short,

Disneypedia: Bambi's Friends, "What's Your Season?" quiz, Virtual Forest,

"Forest Adventure" game, Disney's Storytime: "Thumper Goes Exploring",

Bambi II preview; OOP; 2005 Don Dunagan Interview; Review 6 Saludos Amigos 1943 Walt & El Grupo

Caballeros Collection

Gold Collection uncensored on documentary Walt & El Grupo's DVD; 1.33:1, DD 5.1, trailer; Review

Classic Caballeros Collection: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, "South of the Border with Disney",

2 shorts, Walt Disney interview, The Three Caballeros; $19.99 SRP; Edited; Review

Original DVD: 1.33:1, DD 2.0, trailer, featurette; Edited; OOP; Review 7 The Three Caballeros 1945 Caballeros Collection

Gold Collection 1.33:1, DD 5.1, "South of the Border with Disney", 2 cartoon shorts,

Walt Disney interview, Saludos Amigos; $19.99 SRP; Review

Original DVD: 1.33:1, DD 2.0, trailer, 2 shorts; OOP; Review 8 Make Mine Music 1946 Gold Collection 1.33:1, DD mono, 3 Silly Symphony cartoons; Edited; Review 9 Fun and Fancy Free 1947 Gold Collection 1.33:1, DD mono, music video, read-along, game, featurette; Review 10 Melody Time 1948 Gold Collection 1.33:1, DD mono, 3 cartoon shorts; Edited; Review; Unedited R2 DVD 11 The Adventures of

Ichabod and Mr. Toad 1949 Gold Collection 1.33:1, DD mono, Sleepy Hollow read-along, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride game,

"The Merrily Song" sing-along, 2 cartoon shorts; $19.99 SRP; Review 12 Cinderella 1950 Diamond Edition BD + DVD:

BD + DVD + DC:

Trilogy Collection:

1-Disc DVD Edition:

Platinum Edition DVD:

Collector's Gift Set

Diamond Edition (1 Blu-ray + 1 DVD): 1.33:1, DTS-HD MA 5.1; $39.99 SRP;

Review; Also in 3-disc edition with digital

copy and Limited Edition 6-Disc Trilogy combo pack ($89.99 SRP)

2-Disc Platinum Edition: 1.33:1, DD mono, 5.1 EHT remix, "From Rags to

Riches" making-of documentary, "The Art of Mary Blair", "The Cinderella

That Almost Was", "From Walt's Table: A Tribute to Disney's Nine Old Men",

6 theatrical trailers, 2 deleted scenes with intro, 7 unused song demos,

storyboard-to-film comparison, 1922 Cinderella Laugh-o-Gram, Cinderella

Stories from ESPN Classics, art galleries, Helene Stanley The Mickey Mouse

Club excerpt, 3 vintage radio programs, "The House of Royalty" make-over,

music videos: Disney Channel Circle of Stars - "A Dream is a Wish Your

Heart Makes" and Disney Princesses - "Every Girl Can Be a Princess",

"The Royal Life" DVD-ROM feature; Out of Print; Detailed DVD Review

Collector's Gift Set: Platinum DVD plus companion book, 8 animators'

sketches, numbered film frame; Out of Print; Gift Set Extras Review 13 Alice in Wonderland 1951 60th Anniversary BD + DVD:

Un-Anniversary Edition DVD:

Masterpiece Edition DVD:

60th Anniversary Edition Blu-ray + DVD; 1.33:1 OAR, 5.1 DTS-HD MA; $39.99 SRP;

"Through the Keyhole: A Companion's Guide to Wonderland" viewing mode,

"Painting the Roses Red" game, Walt Disney's color TV introduction, Alice

and the Doorknob reference footage, shrinking Alice pencil test (introduced

by Kathryn Beaumont), DisneyView, classic DVD extas; Review

2-Disc Special Un-Anniversary Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1 & 1.0;

new deleted scene "Pig and Pepper", new "Reflections on Alice" featurette,

and nearly all Masterpiece Edition extras; $29.99 SRP; Review

2-Disc Masterpiece Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1 & 1.0; Out of Print; Review

One Hour in Wonderland, "Through the Mirror" Mickey Mouse short, trailers,

virtual tea party, Alice comedy Alice's Wonderland, "I'm Odd" unused song,

2 Walt Disney Introductions, art gallery, abandoned content, song demos,

"Fred Waring Show", everything from GC disc & more; Interview with

Kathryn Beaumont, the voice and model for Alice; Gold Collection:

1.33:1, DD 5.0, featurette, storybook, game, sing-alongs; OOP; Review 14 Peter Pan 1953 Platinum Edition DVD

Special Edition DVD

Diamond Edition (1 Blu-ray + 1 DVD): 1.33:1, DTS-HD MA 5.1; $39.99 SRP;

Review

2-Disc Platinum Edition - 1.33:1, DD 5.1 EHT & 1.0; $29.99 SRP; audio

commentary, "In Walt's Words: Why I Made Peter Pan", deleted songs,

2 music videos, "The Peter Pan Story" 1952 featurette, "You Can Fly: The

Making of Peter Pan", "The Peter Pan That Almost Was", DVD storybook,

Camp Never Land games, magical environment, "Tinker Bell: A Fairy's

Tale", Tinker Bell sneak peek; Review; Interview: Kathryn Beaumont,

voice/model for Wendy; Interview: Margaret Kerry, model for Tinker

Bell; El Capitan Report; Out of Print; Also available in 3-Movie Collection

with Return to Neverland and Tinker Bell; OOP

Special Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, commentary, featurettes, game; Review

Out of Print; Previously a Limited Issue DVD (OOP) 15 Lady and the Tramp 1955 Diamond Edition BD + DVD:

Diamond Edition BD + DVD + DC:

Platinum Edition DVD:

Diamond Edition (1 Blu-ray + 1 DVD): 2.55:1, DTS-HD MA 5.1; $39.99 SRP;

Inside Walt's Story Meetings Disney Second Screen and audio commentary,

3 deleted scenes, Diane Disney Miller: Remembering Dad", "Finding Lady: The

Art of the Storyboard", original 1943 storyboard version of film, "Lady's

Pedigree: The Making of Lady and the Tramp"; "PuppyPedia: Going to the

Dogs", "Bella Notte" music video, trailers, "Disneyland" TV show excerpts, "The

Siamese Cat Song: Finding a Voice for Cats"; Review; Also available in DVD packaging

and in 3-disc edition with digital copy ($44.99 SRP)

2-Disc Platinum Edition re-release - 2.55:1 16:9, 1.33:1, DD 5.1 EHT & 3.0,

"Lady's Pedigree: The Making of Lady and the Tramp", "Finding Lady: The Art

of the Storyboard", Original 1943 storyboards, trailers, deleted scenes,

"The Siamese Cat Song: Finding a Voice for the Cats", music video: Steve

Tyrell - "Bella Notte", "DisneyPedia: Going to the Dogs", "Disney Dog

Trivia" virtual board game, "Your Inner Bark" quiz, Disney Virtual Puppy

DVD-ROM; 29.99 SRP; "50th Anniversary Edition"; Out of Print; Review

Related: UD's Tour of Disney's ARL; El Capitan Screening Report

original Limited Issue DVD: 2.35:1, DD 5.1; Review; Out of Print # Title Year Available on DVD? Notes 16 Sleeping Beauty 1959 Platinum Edition DVD:

Platinum Blu-ray + DVD:

Special Edition DVD:

2-Disc Platinum Edition; 2.55:1 16:9, DD EHT 5.1 & 4.0; $29.99 SRP; Review

audio commentary, Disney song selection, music video, Grand Canyon short,

"Peter Tchaikovsky Story" Disneyland episode, making-of documentary,

featurettes, deleted songs, gallery, live-action reference, trailers, games,

Disneyland excerpt, storyboards, Sleeping Beauty Castle walkthrough; OOP

Also on Blu-ray with BD-Live bonuses;$34.99 SRP; Disney Blu-ray; OOP

Interview with Mary Costa, voice of Princess Aurora

2-Disc Special Edition: 2.35:1 16:9, 1.33:1 p&s, DD 5.1, documentary,

3-D virtual galleries, music, trailers, 2 games, 2 Story Reels, design and

restoration featurettes, commentary, live-action reference, music video,

"Grand Canyon" short, "Peter Tchaikovsky Story"; Review 17 101 Dalmatians 1961 Platinum Edition DVD:

Limited Issue DVD:

2-Disc Platinum Edition: 1.33:1, DD EHT 5.1, DD 1.0; Review

101 pop-up trivia facts (family & fan modes), Selena Gomez "Cruella

De Vil" music video, deleted songs and demos, trailers & TV/radio ads

"Sincerely Yours, Walt Disney" correspondence featurette, "Redefining

the Line: The Making of 101 Dalmatians", "Cruella De Vil: Drawn

to be Bad", Virtual Dalmatians DVD-ROM and set-top, Puppy Profiler quiz,

"Fun with Language" games; Out of Print; California Junket Report

Interviews: Lisa Davis (voice/model of Anita), Alice Davis, Andreas Deja

Limited Issue DVD: 1.33:1, DD 2.0; Out of Print; Review 18 The Sword in the Stone 1963 50th Anniversary BD + DVD + DC:

45th Anniversary DVD:

Gold Collection DVD: 50th Anniversary Edition: 1.75:1, DD 5.1, alternate opening, digital copy; Review

45th Anniversary Edition: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, 2 bonus shorts, Merlin's Magical

Academy game, Sherman Brothers music featurette, "Disneyland"

episode clip, art & facts scrapbooks, song selection; Review

Gold Collection DVD: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, shorts, featurettes; OOP; Review 19 The Jungle Book 1967 Platinum Edition DVD:

Limited Issue DVD:

2-Disc Platinum Edition: 1.75:1 16:9, DD 1.0 & EHT 5.1, audio commentary,

Disney Song Selection, Jonas Brothers music video, "The Bare Necessities:

The Making of The Jungle Book", "The Lure of The Jungle Book" animators

featurette, "Lost Character: Rocky the Rhino", deleted scenes, 7 deleted

songs, "Mowgli's Return to the Wild" with voice actor Bruce Reitherman,

"Disney's Kipling", "Baloo's Virtual Swingin' Jungle Cruise", language

activities, art galleries, "DisneyPedia: Junglemania!"; $29.99 SRP; OOP; Review

Limited Issue DVD: 1.33:1, DD 2.0; Out of Print; Review 20 The Aristocats 1970 Blu-ray + DVD:

Special Edition DVD:

Gold Collection Blu-ray + DVD: Review

Special Edition DVD - 1.75:1 16:9, DD 5.1, deleted song, featurette,

2 games, Disney Song Selection, bonus Figaro short Bath Day,

"Disneyland" episode excerpt, art gallery, DVD-ROM; Review

Gold Collection DVD: 1.33:1, DD 2.0, trailer, game, read-along; OOP; Review 21 Robin Hood 1973 35th Anniv. Combo:

Most Wanted DVD:

Gold Collection DVD:

35th Anniversary Edition Blu-ray + DVD: digital copy, deleted storyline; Review

Most Wanted Edition - 1.75:1 16:9, DD 5.1, alternate ending,

video/stills art gallery, set-top games "Archery Trivia Challenge" and

"Rescue Maid Marian", bonus Mickey and Minnie short Ye Olden

Days, Disney Song Selection, cardboard slipcover; $29.99 SRP; Review

Gold Collection: 1.33:1, mono, short, trivia, sing-along, read-along; Review 22 The Many Adventures

of Winnie the Pooh 1977 Blu-ray + DVD

Friendship Edition

25th Anniversary

Blu-ray + DVD + Digital Copy: Review

The Friendship Edition; 1.33:1, DD 5.1, all 25th Anniversary Ed. extras

plus slipcover and "My Friends Tigger & Pooh" episode; OOP; Review

25th Anniversary Ed.: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, featurette, A Day for Eeyore, gallery,

pop-up fun facts, music video, interactive storybook; Out of Print; Review 23 The Rescuers 1977 2-Movie BD + DVDs:

DVD: 2 Movie Collection Blu-ray + DVD: $39.99 SRP; Review

DVD: 1.66:1 16:9, DD 5.1, "Water Birds" True-Life Adventure, "Under The Hat",

"3 Blind Mousketeers" short, art scrapbook, sing-along, game; Review 24 The Fox and the Hound 1981 2 Movie BD + DVD

25th Anniversary

Gold Collection

30th Anniversary Edition 2 Movie Collection Blu-ray + DVD with The Fox and

the Hound 2; 1 Blu-ray & 2 DVD combo; 1.66:1, 5.1 DTS-HD MA; $39.99 SRP;

Blu-ray: "Unlikely Friends" featurette; DVD: "Passing the Baton:", "Best of

Friends" sing-along, Lucas Grabeel's "You Know I Will" music video, "Making

the Music"; Review; Also in DVD packaging

and in 2-Disc DVD-Only set minus "Unlikely Friends"; $29.99 SRP

25th Anniversary DVD: 1.33:1, DD 5.1, "Passing the Baton",

art gallery, bonus shorts Lambert the Sheepish Lion and Lend a Paw, "Forest

Friendship Game", "Best of Friends" sing along song; $29.99 SRP; Review

Gold Collection: 1.33:1, DD 2.0, read-along, game, trailer; OOP; Review 25 The Black Cauldron 1985 25th Anniversary

Gold Collection 2.35:1 16:9, DD 5.1; new deleted scene "The Fairfolk",

new game "The Witches' Challenge", Donald Duck short Trick or Treat,

old trivia game, art gallery; $19.99 SRP; Review

Gold Collection DVD: gallery, trailer, short, game; OOP; Review 26 The Great Mouse Detective 1986 Blu-ray + DVD:

DVD: Mystery in the Mist Edition Blu-ray + DVD; $29.99 SRP

Mystery in the Mist Edition DVD: 1.78:1 16:9, DD 5.1; "So You Think You

Can Sleuth?", making-of featurette, sing-along song; $19.99 SRP; Review

Original DVD: 1.66:1 16:9, DD 5.1, featurette, 2 animated shorts,

art & photo scrapbook, sing-along; OOP; Review 27 Oliver & Company 1988 25th Anniversary BD + DVD:

20th Anniversary

Special Edition 25th Anniversary Edition Blu-ray + DVD; 1.85:1; Review

20th Anniversary Edition: original DVD extras plus new game; Review

1.66:1 16:9, DD 5.1, promotional featurettes, trailers & TV ads,

scrapbook, 2 sing-alongs, fun film facts, 2 bonus shorts; OOP; Review 28 The Little Mermaid 1989 Diamond Edition BD + DVD:

Diamond Edition BD + DVD + DC:

Diamond Edition Blu-ray 3D Combo:

Platinum Edition

Limited Issue

NEW! Diamond Edition combo packs coming October 1, 2013: Press Release

available as Blu-ray + DVD ($39.99 SRP), Blu-ray + DVD in DVD Case ($39.99 SRP),

Blu-ray + DVD + Digital Copy ($44.99 SRP), and Blu-ray 3D + Blu-ray +

DVD + Digital Copy + Music ($49.99 SRP)

2-Disc Platinum Edition - 1.78:1 16:9, DD 5.1 Disney Enhanced Home

Theater mix, "Treasures Untold: The Making of The Little Mermaid",

audio commentary, deleted scenes and song, "The Story Behind the

Story" featurette, music video: Ashley Tisdale - "Kiss the Girl", Disney

Song Selection, "Under the Sea Adventure" virtual ride inspired by Disney

Imagineers, "The Ride That Almost Was", art gallery, "Storm Warning:

Special Effects Unit", "DisneyPedia: Life Under the Sea", early presentation

reel, trailer, Easter eggs; $29.99 SRP; Review; Out of Print

Also available in Little Mermaid Trilogy with sequels; OOP

original Limited Issue DVD: 1.66:1, DD 5.1; Out of Print; Review 29 The Rescuers Down Under 1990 2-Movie BD + DVDs:

DVD: 2 Movie Collection Blu-ray + DVD: Review

Gold Collection DVD: 1.66:1 16:9, DD 4.0, trivia game, read-along; $19.99 SRP; Review 30 Beauty and the Beast 1991 Diamond Edition Blu-ray

+ DVD:

2-Disc DVD:

Blu-ray 3D Combo: NEW!

Platinum Edition:

Diamond Edition (2 Blu-ray Discs, 1 DVD): 1.78:1, 7.1 DTS-HD MA; $39.99 SRP;

"theatrical", extended and work-in-progress cuts, audio commentary, sing-along

mode, "Composing a Classic", deleted scenes, "Broadway Beginnings", Jordin Sparks'

"Beauty and the Beast" music video, 6-act "Beyond Beauty: The Untold Stories Behind

the Making of Beauty and the Beast" documentary with branching, "Enchanted Musical

Challenge", "Bonjour, Who is This?", classic DVD bonus features; Review

New 2-Disc DVD; $29.99 SRP

October 4: 5-Disc Diamond Edition Blu-ray 3D + Blu-ray (2) + DVD + Digital Copy

combo pack; $49.99 SRP

2-disc Platinum Edition: 1.85:1 16:9, DD 5.1, THX, 3 versions, commentary;

documentaries, featurettes, music videos, trailers, galleries; OOP; Review # Title Year Available on DVD? Notes 31 Aladdin 1992 Platinum Edition

Collector's Set

2-Disc Platinum Edition: 1.66:1 16:9, DD 5.1, Home Theater remix,

THX, French & Spanish tracks, 2 audio commentaries, song selection,

"A Diamond in the Rough: The Making of Aladdin", deleted scenes,

pop-up trivia mode, art review, "Alan Menken: Music Renaissance Man",

deleted songs, 3 music videos, 4 games/activities; Out of Print

Collector's Gift Set: Platinum Edition DVD plus animators' signed sketches,

actual film frame, DVD Companion book; OOP; Detailed DVD Review 32 The Lion King 1994 Diamond Edition Blu-ray

+ DVD:

Blu-ray 3D Combo:

Trilogy BD + DVD:

2011 DVD Edition:

Platinum Edition

Collector's Set 2-Disc Diamond Edition Blu-ray + DVD; $39.99 SRP; Review

Also in DVD Packaging, 4-Disc Blu-ray 3D + Blu-ray + DVD + Digital

combo ($49.99 SRP), 8-Disc Trilogy Collection with DVDs and Blu-rays of The Lion

King II and The Lion King 1½ ($100.00 SRP)

November 15: New 1-Disc DVD Edition; $29.99 SRP

Platinum Edition DVD 2-disc set: 1.66:1 16:9, DD 5.1, DD with EHT,

IMAX cut with optional new song, commentary, 3 games, deleted scenes,

5 sets of featurettes, character galleries, 4 music videos; OOP; Review

Collector's Gift Set: Platinum Edition DVD plus 9 signed drawings

and Special Edition book...Detailed DVD Review 33 Pocahontas 1995 2-Movie BD + DVDs:

10th Anniversary Edition DVD: 2 Movie Collection 1 Blu-ray + 2 DVDs; $39.99 SRP; Review

2-Disc 10th Anniversary Edition set - 1.66:1 16:9, DD 5.1; Review

2 versions of film: original theatrical cut or special edition with deleted song

"If I Never Knew You" fully restored, audio commentary, "The Making of

Pocahontas" documentary, 9 deleted scenes with select audio commentary,

2 music videos: "If I Never Knew You", "Colors of the Wind", "The Making of

If I Never Knew You", early presentation reel with intro and commentary,

production progression reel, animation tests, production art galleries,

"The Premiere in the Park" featurette, trailers, 2 sing-along songs, multi-

language reel, storyboard-to-film comparison, "Follow Your Heart" game,

Disney's Art Project; Out of Print; Interview: Irene Bedard, Pocahontas' Voice

Gold Collection: 1.66:1, DD 5.1, trailer, music videos, read-along, game 34 The Hunchback of Notre Dame 1996 2-Movie BD + DVDs:

DVD: 2 Movie Collection: 1 Blu-ray + 2 DVDs; $39.99 SRP; Review

1.85:1 16:9, DD/DTS 5.1, commentary, making-of, game, more; Review 35 Hercules 1997 BD + DVD + DC:

New DVD: NEW! 1.78:1, 5.1 DD & DTS-HD MA; $29.99 SRP; making-of featurette, Ricky Martin music video,

"Zero to Hero" sing-along; Review

Gold Collection DVD: 1.66:1, DD 5.1, music video, featurette; limited issue re-release; Review 36 Mulan 1998 2-Movie BD + DVDs:

Special Edition DVD:

2 Movie Collection: 1 Blu-ray + 2 DVDs; $39.99 SRP; Review

deleted scenes (incl. alternate openings & deleted song), Fun Facts,

DisneyPedia: Mulan's World, progression demo, early production reels,

5 music videos incl. Jackie Chan, Christina Aguilera, 98º and Stevie Wonder,

featurettes, design & promotional art galleries, storyboard-to-film; Review

Also released in 2-Movie Collection DVD with Mulan II; Out of Print

Collector's Ed.

Standard

Collector's Ed

Big Wave Edition

Original DVD
